bibl.title: with contributions by A. BENAISSA, L. CAPPONI, N. GONIS, Chr. MÜLKE, D. OBBINK, P.M. PINTO, F. SCHIRONI, G. UCCIARDELLO, G.A. XENIS, J. YUAN, and A.G. BERESFORD, M.P. POBJOY, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXI (Nos 4803-4843).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXI, 4803-4843. - I. Theological Texts (4803-4806). - II. New Literary Texts (4807-4812). - III. Homer and Homerica (4813-4821). - IV. Documentary Texts (4822-4837). - V. Drawings (4838-4843). [List of numbers in The Oxyrhynchus Papyri series allocated in advance to 6 drawings. Nos 4838-4842 are edited by: Helen WHITEHOUSE, Drawing a Fine Line in Oxyrhynchus, Oxyrhynchus. A City and Its Texts = Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 93 (London, 2007) pp. 296-306, 2 figg. et pll. XXVI-XXX coul.]

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: HATZILAMBROU R., P.J. PARSONS, and J. CHAPA, with contributions by A. BENAISSA, L. CAPPONI, N. GONIS, Chr. MÜLKE, D. OBBINK, P.M. PINTO, F. SCHIRONI, G. UCCIARDELLO, G.A. XENIS, J. YUAN, and A.G. BERESFORD, M.P. POBJOY, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXI (Nos 4803-4843). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 91.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2007, 8°, xii-164 pp. et XII pll. coul. ISBN 978-0-85698-174-6. £65.
Hatzilambrou Parsons Chapa Benaissa Capponi Gonis Mülke Obbink Pinto Schironi Ucciardello Xenis Yuan Beresford Pobjoy
